eventDecorators.name: Token transfer
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that ERC20 transfer has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address from which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was sent.

eventDecorators.name: Token spending approval
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that approval to spend ERC20 token has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Approver address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the owner who approved spending of their ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address for which the owner has approved to spend their ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: Approved token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was approved for spending.

functionDecorators.name: Get total token supply
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total supply of this ERC20 token.

returnDecorators.name: Total token supply
returnDecorators.description: The total supply of this ERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: Get balance
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of ERC20 tokens owned by the specified address.

parameterDecorators.name: Account address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the account for which to check balance.

returnDecorators.name: Token amount
returnDecorators.description: The amount of the ERC20 tokens owned by the specified address.

functionDecorators.name: Transfer tokens
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the specified ERC20 token amount to the specified address. Transaction sender is the address from which the tokens will be sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 tokens will be sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 tokens to send.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: Transfer approved tokens
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the specified ERC20 token amount from one address to another. The ERC20 tokens must be approved for spending by the source address for the transaction sender.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Source address from which the ERC20 tokens will be sent. Must have approved spending of ERC20 tokens by the transaction sender.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 tokens will be sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 tokens to send.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: Approve token spending
functionDecorators.description: Approves the specified amount for spending for the specified spender address. Transaction sender is implicitly the approving owner.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the spender for which spending will be approved.

parameterDecorators.name: Approved token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to approve for spending.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: Get allowance
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the approving owner.

parameterDecorators.name: Approver address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the owner which approved spending.

returnDecorators.name: Approved token amount
returnDecorators.description: The amount which was approved for spending.
